sentences.english: As they picked tea, the girls sang happily.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘们一边采茶，一边愉快地唱歌。

sentences.english: Hope in the day of aftertime to get along with everyone delectation.
sentences.chinese: 希望在今后的日子里与大家相处愉快。

sentences.english: I hope you HAs a maximum glad or prosperous New Year.
sentences.chinese: 谨祝新年愉快开心，大吉大利。

sentences.english: I delightedly hugged and greeted my grandchildren.
sentences.chinese: 我愉快地拥抱了我的孙子孙女，和他们打招呼。

sentences.english: Many of us have had bad experiences with one or more doctors.
sentences.chinese: 我们许多人都曾有与医生不愉快的经验。

sentences.english: There is even a big fine if one disobeys the laws.
sentences.chinese: 要能有愉快的车程，遵守安全法规是很重要的。

sentences.english: The bird in the clock gaily hops out and says cuckoo.
sentences.chinese: 钟里的小鸟愉快地跳出来，“布谷布谷”地叫着。

sentences.english: Some cats initially find the sensation of being petted as pleasurable.
sentences.chinese: 有些猫一开始会对抚摸感到愉快。

sentences.english: Lively and vivacious, Bettie was her father's favourite.
sentences.chinese: 生动而活泼，身心愉快是她父亲的喜爱。

sentences.english: Good tiding for Christmas and a happy new year!
sentences.chinese: 祂祝福你新年常常平安愉快。

sentences.english: “Soft” hover effects often support the navigation design by making browsing more pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 导航设计中的鼠标悬停效果会让浏览变得更愉快。

sentences.english: Nothing gets vultures squawking louder with delight than a wave of forced selling.
sentences.chinese: 只有被迫出售才能是这些秃鹫发出愉快的叫声。

sentences.english: I see a happy face smiling at me .
sentences.chinese: 我看一张愉快的脸对着我微笑。

sentences.english: Hello from the other side of unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 失业其实也有令人愉快的一面。

sentences.english: Turn pics of your favorite guy or girl into titillating memories.
sentences.chinese: 可将你喜爱的男孩或女孩的照片转变成愉快的记忆。

definition: to feel happy/to rejoice/to have a great time/to make fun of sb
harmonious/friendly relations/on good terms with one another
